short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize everyday tasks in Salesforce Marketing Cloud with an extensive utility pack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key features:

Test Recipient Management: Quickly add, remove, and organize test recipients for various business units and scenarios.

Data Extension Search: Find the folders where your data extensions are located, and view them in Contact Builder

Supercharged Query Studio: Write and save up to 50 different queries that you can run at any point in any Business Unit.

Visual UI Improvements: Increases the width for folder selection windows, making navigation and selection process faster.

Quick copy Subscribers folder IDs: Quickly extract specific folder IDs from your audiences folder structure to use in your automations.

Total Exclusions sum: For any email sends, you can see the total excluded recipients count

---

Data Handling: All data is stored using your local storage, ensuring data security and privacy.
